description:
Devoted to helping you obtain the full amount of compensation you deserve following a work-related accident or other preventable tragedy, the attorneys at the Morrison & Hughes Law Firm in Hiram, Georgia, provide exceptional advocacy and support to clients throughout the greater Atlanta area and beyond who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Car and truck accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, and other preventable tragedies
  • Workers' compensation
  • Social Security Disability
  • Wage and overtime disputes

Our law firm's team of award-winning attorneys has decades of combined legal experience, and we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients. Regardless of the cause of your suffering, you can rely on us for fierce advocacy at every turn. We also use the latest in legal technology to present the most compelling case on your behalf to improve your likelihood for obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, two of our lawyers are AV Preeminent peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell, and we have earned many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. In addition, we have received Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as the Platinum Client Champion Award from Martindale-Hubbell.

As further evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include three offices across the Atlanta metro area, so we can provide convenient access to the quality legal counsel you need when you need it the most. To find out more, you can contact the Morrison & Hughes Law Firm to schedule a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
